string.text: Who do you have for me to fight?

So, your first fight? Your opponent is a piece of meat just like you. HeТs here because of his debts and he only has two options: to come out and fight, or to land himself in the nearest anomaly. HeТs gonna fight like a cornered animal. Equipment for todayЕ Lemme thinkЕ How about you two use basic pistols, two boxes of ammo should be plenty. Either kick his ass or we feed you to the dogs - not much of a choice. Go on now.
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

Your last fight didnТt mean shit, youТre still the same piece of meat you were before and no self-respecting person will bet a single mag on you. If you wanna earn some proper cash youТre gonna have to make a few more appearances in the arena. Your new opponent also got through the first round, and his fight was a lot harder than yours. I donТt like him, to be honest - he kills too quickly and the crowd doesnТt like that. So, go and show us what you can do! The stakes will increase after this fight - all you gotta do is stay alive. Move it!
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

Well, wellЕ YouТre not as much of a pussy as you first seemed. Now itТs time to test you out in a real fight. YouТre up against two guys. The first oneТs called Swede and I donТt remember the second oneТs name. They were paired up intentionally as they hate each otherТs guts so donТt worry about them working as a team - theyТre more likely to shoot each other. Today is shotgun day so donТt let them get too close or weТll have to pick you up piece by piece. The odds are 10:1 so if you win youТll make a fair amount. Off you go!
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

Well, now I can safely say that youТre a fighter, a real fighter. Now itТs time for a team fight. You get to fight with two rookies - two brothers - on your side. They havenТt fought yet but theyТre brothers, so I had to put them into a team fight. I wouldnТt expect any real help from them if I were you. YouТre fighting an experienced team, theyТre contenders for the final this season. A dangerous lot. They use different weapons but one has an automatic shotgun - be very careful with him. Good luck, palЕ YouТre gonna need it.
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

YouТve got a special fight today. Even the army has heard about you! DonТt be surprised, they fight here too - thereТs even a general in the crowd. These guys are from the Spetsnaz or OMON. TheyТre well armed and their armour is as good as youТd expect. DonТt worry though, I ainТt gonna leave you out in the rain, either. YouТll get a vest used by Freedom - itТs light so it wonТt slow you down. Go on, show them that stalkers ainТt no whipping boys. Good luck!
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

Time for you to show what you can do. Duty captured a group of bandits that had been causing problems for stalkers near Rostok. Duty took Тem at night so most of the bandits were taken alive. They were all gonna be executed anyway so I convinced Duty to give them a chance. If any of them survive, theyТll go in the can outside the Zone, which is better than dying here. TheyТre not well-armed - probably just a few pistols and sawn-offs - but thereТs six of them so watch yourself. Go on now!
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

Well, youТre almost in the final. Now youТll be fighting a real stalker. HeТs alone but heТs got an assault rifle and heТs inside an exoskeleton. Catch one burst and youТre toast. There will be a surprise that I canТt tell you about tooЕ HereТs my advice: be prepared, itТs gonna be tough. The winner makes it through to the final. Fight to the death, go!
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.

Congratulations, youТre in the final! One more to go and this one is to the death, every man for himself. There will be 4 other stalkers in the arena: all real pros in exoskeletons but itТs a fair deal this time - youТll get exactly what they have. The only thing is, you donТt get medkits or bandages in a fight to the death. Ready? Go prove youТre the best, GO!
IТm ready.
IТm not ready.
Yo! You paid me for a fight but you just walked away!
Yo! IТve got a new fight for you.
Go have a drink or something. The Arena ainТt ready yet.
YouТve already become a pro!!!
You won! HereТs your reward.
YouТre not experienced enough for this fight.
Sorry, but the current fighting season is over.
What challenge do you have for me?
There is nothing to fight, come again later when we have some more mutants.
ThereТs a fee for participation. 1,000 RU.
Fine, hereТs your money.
I donТt have enough money.
Then get out of here, stalker.
You owe me 2,000 RU for participation.
Fine, hereТs your money.
I already paid you!
I donТt have enough money.
Then stop asking so many questions.
Pay 3,000 RU for participation and the bloodsucker is yours.
Fine. HereТs your money.
I donТt have enough.
DonТt waste my time, stalker.
Not so fast. The price for participation is 5,000 RU.
Fine. HereТs the money.
I donТt have enough money.
DonТt try pretending to be a beggar.
The price for participating is 5,000 RU.
Fine. HereТs your money.
I donТt have enough money.
Let me guess. Someone stole your roubles?
ThereТs a pseudodog. A large specimen, but quite beaten up. On the other hand itТs a very fierce one, just like my mother-in-law.
Deal. Before you fight you should place a stake on the time you need to make the kill. If you manage to pull it off youТll make yourself a little extra spending money.
30 seconds, triple win.
One and a half minutes, double win.
Without a time limit. A half-stake win.
I changed my mind.
Tough shit. YouТve already paid.
I can do that. IТll fight your dog.
A dog? Is that all you have?
Aw, is our girl afraid of a little doggie? DonТt be upset.
There is a freak in a gas-mask, called a snork. Thin and feeble-looking but quite agile.
Great, weТll get everything ready. Enter the arena.
Bring it on. IТll fight your snork.
They make my stomach turn. Hell no.
Scared by a half-rotten gas-masked freak?
This time weТve gotten truly lucky. We caught a young bloodsucker. Still dumb, but already with bad manners.
Go ahead, get the bloodsucker ready.
A bloodsucker? Fuck that!
What? You love bloodsuckers now? When did you join Freedom?
This time weТve a fat little midget in a black cloak - the locals call it a burer.
Fat and short? Easy. IТll do it.
IТve heard all about those things. IТll pass.
He hardly reaches your waist in height. And he scares you?
Today is a special day. I donТt know where they foundЕ HimЕ But heТs a real beast.
Deal. IТll put him out of his misery.
I donТt feel like dying, find someone else.
Well, frankly even I find the beast scary. But IТm not fighting in the arena, so who cares?
Got a couple of questions.
Shoot.
Never mind.
What is this establishment?
This is the arena, my little business. A place where stalkers can test their mettle and earn their fame by fighting against the horrors of the Zone.
How do you get the mutants here?

We made a deal with Duty, instead of killing all the mutants they find they bring the weaker ones here in exchange for cash. Duty gets paid, the mutants get killed, and then I get paid. Everybody wins.
Where are you from?
I am from many places. I heard about this little backwater and understood that I could earn a good little penny here. So here I am.
What are the rules?

Oh, the rules are pretty simple. I invented them myself. For challenges, thereТs a cage, and a mutant is let inside the cage. You pay money and tell me the time you need to kill the monster. If you make it - you win, if you donТt - I win.\nBut for the main course, bandits and the ZoneТs other degenerates captured by Duty fight in the arena for their crimes. Some are just stalkers who fancy a fight, and not actually criminals, but whoever leaves the arena in the least amount of pieces gets a sizeable reward. If they keep on winning fights, then more stalkers will come to watch, and the combatants win larger rewards.
Good to see you stalker, welcome to the arena.
So, what are you waiting for? Get into the cage.
Sorry, thereТs nothing to fight against yet. Wait for a day or two until we can catch a new mutant.
There you are! Well done! HereТs your win. If you desire another fight for money then just drop in whenever.
Sorry, bro, but you lose. Come again next time if you want.
Oh, hello. WhatТs up?
What do you need, stalker?.
You here to buy some shit?
—лушай, а где тут оружие хорошее можно достать?

ƒа, брат, есть така€ проблема. ћесто у нас попул€рное, поток сталкеров большой - всЄ новое оружие, что поступает, скупают почти моментально. ≈щЄ и Ђдолговцыї под боком обосновались, а им тоже стрел€ть из чего-то надо. Ќынче на старый ј —” очередь уже на неделю вперЄд, не говор€ уже про что-нибудь более солидное. ¬ общем, ловить у нас однозначно нечего. ѕридЄтс€ тебе либо дальше, на север топать, где народ позажиточнее, либо с военными пробовать договоритьс€. ј если не особо придирчив и определЄнные св€зи имеешь, то можешь к бандитам попробовать наведатьс€. ” них пусть и старьЄ вс€кое, но всЄ же стрел€ет. «аодним там же и сбыть весь свой хлам можешь, если имеетс€. ћестный торгаш пусть и за бесценок, но зато всЄ подр€д скупает.
¬от как оно всЄЕ —пасибо, что рассказал.
I want to buy information.
What are you interested in?
Can i get information about bandit permit?
This information will cost you 1000 RU.

IТm the one who does this business. Did you decide to get back to Cordon, or to run off to Dark Valley? I can send out a couple of messages so that the local punks will not run into you without need for some time. Well, when youТre there, of course, do not get all heroic - then everything will go smoothly. Such a service costs 10000 RU, you have three days to resolve all your business.
Can i get information about military permit?
This information will cost you 4000 RU.

Such a thing can be organised by General Voronin, the main leader of УDutyers.Ф Go to him and ask for a certificate that you are allowed for some time to be in the Zone on Уlegal groundsФ - people with such permission are not touched by military. Naturally, such a procedure is not free, and it only lasts a few days. But for a person without ties and proper reputation - this is the only option.
Can i get information about mercenaries permit?
This information will cost you 2000 RU.

Several stalkers are working for me - they get information for me, orders are delivered, itТs a common thing. Throughout The Zone run you do not want to hire mercenaries, but sometimes you have to meet them. In such a case, we have a contract, so that without any concern my guys would not have any problems. I can and write you in aside my couriers for a week, but please note - this service is not cheap. Considering all possible risks and expenses on my part, it will cost you 50000.
Alright, hereТs your money.
I changed my mind.
ItТs your business.
Thanks for the information.
Hey, guy. How goes the Zone? SoЕ I hope you have repair work that needs doneЕ heh. I need some cash bad.
